Articles.Content:
I bought KSP a long time ago, back in 2013 I think - but when I tried to play it, everything was hard and unintuitive, so I decided I'll wait until the game is finished. I got back to it in March 2015 after watching some youtube videos and began playing 0.90. I spent hours trying to get things into orbit, then to the Mun, then to dock two things together... Now I have more than 400 hours played, at least according to Steam ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I was reading those forums for a long time, now I finally decided to register. 

Some of my constructions: 

Elephant Base with 4 rovers (0.90):

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bpz42YH3PdI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Welcome to the forums. Its good to see long time players \*finally\* taking the plunge and joining us.

KSP is addictive, we can help... KSP anonymous.... we don't cure you of your addiction.... we encourage it.
